CodeBlock.Source: &Ubuser = UserId('server') Call(PPr008,&Ubuser,&Pgcod) For Each // Fst017: Fst017 - Empresas Where &Pgcod = Pgcod Defined By Pgpomn &Pgfape = Pgfape For Each // Fst198: Guías especiales de proceso Where Tp1cod = &Pgcod Where Tp1cod1 = &Tp1cod1 Where Tp1corr1 = &Tp1corr1 Where Tp1corr2 = &Tp1corr2 Where Tp1corr3 = &Tp1corr3 Defined By Tp1imp2 &CodGer = Tp1nro1 EndFor EndFor // Extraigo código de gerente de agencia &Tp1cod1 = 21200 &Tp1corr1 = 1 &Tp1corr2 = 20 &Tp1corr3 = 2 &CodGer = 0 For Each Tp1cod1, Tp1cod2, Tp1cod3 // Fst198: Guías especiales de proceso Where Tp1cod = &Pgcod Where Tp1cod1 = &Tp1cod1 Where Tp1corr1 = &Tp1corr1 Where Tp1corr2 = &Tp1corr2 Where Tp1corr3 = &Tp1corr3 Defined By Tp1imp2 &CodGer = Tp1nro1 EndFor // Obtengo sucursal del usuario For Each // Fst046: Fst046 - Códigos de Usuario Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where Ubuser = &Ubuser Defined By UbMnu &Ubsuc1 = Ubsuc EndFor // Obtengo el repositorio &Tp1cod1 = 21200 &Tp1corr1 = 1 &Tp1corr2 = 20 &Tp1corr3 = 1 For Each // Fst198: Guías especiales de proceso Where Tp1cod = &Pgcod Where Tp1cod1 = &Tp1cod1 Where Tp1corr1 = &Tp1corr1 Where Tp1corr2 = &Tp1corr2 Where Tp1corr3 = &Tp1corr3 Defined By Tp1imp3 &repo = Trim(Tp1desc) EndFor For &anterior = 1 To 20 If &pertenece = 'N' &error = 'S' &ResMsg = 'El documento o pertenece a la caja de ahorros seleccionada.' &GP_Mensaje = Udp(PFRRepMsg,&ResMsg,'E') Do 'GP: Reportar mensaje' EndIf EndFor For &BBTIndividual In &BBTSolIndBIM If &JCMA10Sol = &BBTIndividual.CodIndividual &EsBIM = 'S' Exit EndIf EndFor New //-- FSN003 Pgcod = &PPgcod Nrsuc = 222 Trmod = 222 Trnro = 222 Nrtope = NullValue(Nrtope) Nrtcor = NullValue(Nrtcor) Nrtcoi = NullValue(Nrtcoi) Nrtrel = 1 EndNew Sub 'Verificar modulo' &j = 1 &parteDe = 'N' Do While &j <= &modsValC And &parteDe = 'N'//> el módulo If &modsVal(&j) = &I1mod //> El valor es igual al esperado &parteDe = 'S' EndIf &j = &j + 1 EndDo EndSub // 'Verificar modulo' Do Case Case &BTCDNType = 'INS' &g_accion = 'Alta' Case &BTCDNType = 'UPD' &g_accion = 'Modificación' Case &BTCDNType = 'DLT' &g_accion = 'Baja' Otherwise &g_accion = '' EndCase // Agrega el registro a la grilla Do 'GP: Agregar registro a Bandeja' // Realiza el control de carga. Termina la carga si se cargó // completamente la página actual If &GP_CargaTerminada = 'S' Exit EndIf /*&parteDe = 'N' Do While &j <= &modsValC And &parteDe = 'N' If &modsVal(&j) = &I1mod //-- El valor es igual al esperado &parteDe = 'S' EndIf &j = &j + 1 EndDo-*/ &PgmNom = 'PJBRA401' &Debug = 'N' For Each // Fst900: Fst900 - Programas Where Pgcod = &Ppgcod Where PgmNom = &PgmNom Defined By PgmCd1 &Debug = 'S' EndFor &PgmNom = 'PJBRA4s1' For Each // Fst900: Fst900 - Programas Where Pgcod = &Ppgcod Where PgmNom = &PgmNom Defined By PgmCd1 &Debug = 'S' EndFor &PgmNom = 'PJBRW401' For Each // Fst900: Fst900 - Programas Where Pgcod = &Ppgcod Where PgmNom = &PgmNom Defined By PgmCd1 &Debug = 'S' EndFor &PgmNom = 'PJBQA401' For Each // Fst900: Fst900 - Programas Where Pgcod = &Ppgcod Where PgmNom = &PgmNom Defined By PgmCd1 &Debug = 'S' EndFor &OpgCod = 232 For Each // Fst200: Fst200 - Opciones Generales Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where OpgCod = &OpgCod Defined By OpgVal &OpgTxt = OpgTxt EndFor &OpgCod = 233 For Each // Fst200: Fst200 - Opciones Generales Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where OpgCod = &OpgCod Defined By OpgVal &OpgTxt = OpgTxt EndFor &Tpcod = 234 &Tpcorr = 4 For Each // Fst098: Fst098 - Datos Procesos Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where Tpcod = &Tpcod Where Tpcorr = &Tpcorr Defined By Tpdesc &Tpnro = Tpnro &Tpimp = Tpimp EndFor //@fst098 12,'hoa>' //> Agregamos nueva parametría &Tpcorr = 5 /// Modifico algo For Each // Fst098: Fst098 - Datos Procesos Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where Tpcod = &Tpcod Where Tpcorr = &Tpcorr Defined By Tpdesc &Tpnro = Tpnro &Tpimp = Tpimp /// filtro por algo For Each // Fst098: Fst098 - Datos Procesos Where Pgcod = &Pgcod Where Tpcod = &Tpcod Where Tpcorr = &Tpcorr Defined By Tpdesc &Tpnro = Tpnro &Tpimp = Tpimp EndFor EndFor /** * This is a description text with {@see InlineTag inline tags}. * It can also contain HTML. * @return Lines beginning with an @ sign start the tag section. */
